page.title: 12DODDIS-LEIGH SCHOOL
page.content: { {DODDISCOMBSLEIGH SCHOOL}IS THE VERY BEST SCHOOL IN THE TEIGN_VALLEY I THINK.BUT LOTS OF CHANGES HAVE BEEN MADE.THE POPULATION OF CHILDREN HAS GONE DOWN OVER THE YEARS.THE GIRLS AND BOYS TOILETS HAVE BEEN REDONE AND WE ALL HAVE HAD MORE SPORTS FACILITIES TO PRACTICE WITH.WE HAVE HAD THE CHANCE TO GO OUT MORE AND DO MORE DIFFERENT THINGS EACH TIME.WE HAVE HAD LOTS OF DIFFERENT TEACHERS TEACHING US,AND LOVELY DINNERS.WE HAVE HAD TWO CARETAKERS OVER THE PAST TWO YEARS,MRS WESTCOTT AND MRSWORE.THERE HAS BEEN A LOT OF CHANGES. { {
